text: Mercey-le-Grand () is a commune in the Doubs department in Bourgogne-Franche- Comté in eastern France. ==Geography== The commune is west of Besançon. ==Population== ==Related pages== * Communes of the Doubs department ==References== ==Other websites== * Mercey-le-Grand on the intercommunal Web site of the department Category:Communes in Doubs
title: Mercey-le-Grand
